column4: I'm having a problem with my ubuntu - I receive its internet via a router, and after I uninstalled a lot of packages, the OS is telling me I have no network connection - any clue on what I may have acidentally removed, since that computer receives its connection by NAT?
did you uninstall your NIC drivers?
I have no clue on what that is >_>
Ah, ok, yes you cawn restore it. astro76 you tihnk he could get the package from the disc?
